org.sadiframework.utils

Class LSRNUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sadiframework.utils.LSRNUtils

  • public class LSRNUtils
extends Object
    Utility class encapsulating methods useful for converting simple LSRN database records to and from RDF/OWL.
    Author:
    Luke McCarthy

        Returns a Resource that is an instance of the specified type with the specified ID. The Resource will be created with an appropriate URI (@link OUTPUT_URI_PATTERN).
        Parameters:
        type - the type (class) of the new instance
        id - the id of the new instance
        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • getID

        public static String getID(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource root,
                           org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource lsrnIdentifierType)

        Returns the LSRN identifier for the given node. The method will first try to obtain an explicitly specified ID as encoded by the following SIO attribute structure:

         
   root [
     'has attribute'/'has identifier' (SIO_000008/SIO_000067)
       [
         rdf:type $identifierClass;
         'has value' (SIO_000300) $ID
       ]
   ]

        If no such structure is attached to root, then the method will fall back to parsing the ID from the root's URI, using the regular expressions associated with the given LSRN identifier class.

        Parameters:
        root - the root resource
        lsrnIdentifierType - the LSRN identifier type URI (e.g. lsrn:UniProt_Identifier).
        Returns:
        the database identifier of the given node
